alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 12:47AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Sedgwick and eastern Sumner Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 1247 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Halstead to 5 miles southwest of Cheney. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds 35 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Wellington, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Maize, Clearwater, Sedgwick, Belle Plaine, Colwich, Oxford, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, South Haven, Geuda Springs and West Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 22. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
